column5: Hey guys .. so I just moved.. and well instead of painting my room I would like to put up some Fishing posters.... mainly bass fishing (aswell as my own pictures I have taken over the years..), .. or I was also thinking somthing like name brand banners.. such as shimmano .. rapala.. etc.. does any one know where I could buy these? I'm also not looking to spend alot of money on these tho I would like to get a few .. or am I better off taking my old Bassman,FLW,Outdoors.. etc fishing magazines.. and cutting out main page photos?  any ideas would be appreciated..
for a case of beer graffiti guys could create some nice fishing art on your walls... but are YOU ready for that?
Try marinas and ask for thier old advertising posters. Or perhaps a tackle store.
ha I would be willing.. but as long as its remove able aka on a banner or somthing..  thanks for the ideas, as for shops I have tried a few.. but will keep looking
where's Mercer when you need him...
I know when I owned a couple of retails shops in the past that I was inundated with supplier posters and banners .... they usually ended up in the garbage after a few weeks.
well hopefully the next few places that I stop in to , have some and are eager to get rid of them
Hit one of the fishing or sportsmen shows coming up.
good call rick, actually didnt even think of that
